txt.en: 'Those gathered at Fushaum Tûm have amassed a collection of weapons. While scouting along the ridge, I have seen Uruks training for combat below. I believe the encampment is preparing for battle, but I do not know who their target is. We must stop them.'

A notice is pinned to the board, signed by Ingold:\n\n'The encampment of Fushaum Tûm has amassed a collection of weapons. A brave adventurer is needed to destroy the weapons of battle that the encampment of Fushaum Tûm has acquired.'
Destroyed many weapons racks in Fushaum Tum.
Ingold has asked you to destroy weapon racks at Fushaum Tûm.
You have destroyed many of the weapons located in Fushaum Tum as you continue to keep watch over the encampment.
Ingold, a soldier of Gondor, has scouted Dor Amarth and is concerned with the growing numbers of foes gathering at the encampment of Fushaum Tûm.
